context.author: Fredrik Larsson
context.heading:
Andy and the
spc testfile
component
context.ingress: This is the spc testfile component. If the JavaScript is properly transfered into your project the "Andy Dandy" heading above should be fully responsive, and also you should find a confirmation in the console. The image below, if everything wen't well, should be Mr.Andy staring right at you.
context.content:
SPC is short for Spacecraft
